recipe.title: Blueberry Overnight Oats Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: ⅔ cup ; milk, of your choice ; (160 mL)
½ cup ; vanilla greek yogurt ; (120 g)
⅓ cup ; graham cracker, crushed ; (30 g)

steps.step: In a mason jar or sealable container, add the oats, milk, yogurt, vanilla extract, chia seeds, cinnamon, blueberries, and graham crackers, and stir together.
Seal and place in the refrigerator overnight for up to five days.
Top with additional blueberries, if desired.

steps_updated.steps_updated: In a mason jar or sealable container, add the oats, milk, yogurt, vanilla extract, chia seeds, cinnamon, blueberries, and graham crackers, and stir together.
Seal and place in the refrigerator overnight for up to five days.
Top with additional blueberries, if desired.
